title: [EPIC] Spark 3.4 Remaining Functionality

labels.name: epic
labels.description: Issue that encompasses a significant feature or body of work

body:
This epic encompasses remaining functionality to be implemented, and categorized to make it easier to organize work on these issues.

# Categorized by related functionality

In these buckets, fixing one issue might help solve another issue in the same bucket.

## URL Parsing (start with `parse_url`)
Both of these could probably be implemented with regular expressions or other string manipulation techniques.

- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/6969
- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/6023

## ANSI

- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/5902
- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/6015
- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/7520

## AQE

- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/7514
- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/6678
- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/7503

## Datasource

### Metadata
- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/7963
- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/7524
- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/7510
### Other
- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/5321
- [x] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/7043

- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/7482
- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/8118

## Plan output

- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/6175
- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/6180

## Error Handling

- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/6199
- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/6677

# Categorized by type of fix

Most the issues here are only related by the type of work needed, and will not necessarily relate enough to make solving follow up work any easier.

## CPU Fallback (not categorized)

- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/6543
- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/7478
- [ ] https://github.com/NVIDIA/spark-rapids/issues/8113

## Replicate Functionality
